summary.Title: Part time employees for warehouse in Vejle
summary.JobHeadline: Part time employees for warehouse in Vejle
summary.Presentation:
Are you a student looking to supplement your income, or are you currently employed and seeking an extra earning opportunity? Then we might have a job for you!
Part-Time Warehouse Work in Vejle

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Part time employees for warehouse in Vejle
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a student looking to supplement your income, or are you currently employed and seeking an extra earning opportunity? Then we might have a job for you!

Part-Time Warehouse Work in Vejle – Saturdays & Wednesdays

We’re looking for reliable and hardworking temps to join our costumers busy warehouse team in Vejle. If you’re ready for a physical, fast-paced job, this is for you!

What are the assignments
  • Unload shipping containers.
  • Assist with general warehouse tasks.
  • Handle ad hoc duties as needed.

You’ll need to lift, stand, and walk for most of the day, so being physically fit and flexible is a must.

What We’re Looking For

The right candidate is:

  • Available to work both Saturdays and Wednesdays (some shifts may vary).
  • Comfortable with physical work.
  • Fluent in English (speak, read, and understand).
  • Dependable, punctual, and a team player.
  • Flexible
The Details
  • Hours: Saturdays & Wednesdays, typically 08:00–16:00, with possible overtime (shifts may range between 06:00–18:00).
  • Pay: DKK 165.4/hour + 9% fritvalgskonto.
  • Location: Nothern part of Vejle.
Apply Now

Click "Apply job" to send in your application. If you don’t already have a profile with Moment, you’ll need to create one—it’s quick and easy.

We’re excited to hear from you!
